divs: Sighting DetailsSaw a bright white light hovering . With bonoculars i could se several white lights rotating with occasional greenish blue and red lights. it looked as though saucer shaped crafts came out of it. then it decended then came back up went too one bright white light and hovering for awhile til it decended down behind trees in the distance. there are also several other white bright lights with the blueishgreen and red lights moving in the sky. at first sight you think their stats til they begin moving. they will move verticaly horizontal diagnol s shapes and can stop abruptly . i have been observing these for 7 months now. some i record with my ph others don't show up. what is best to use to record them. if you would like to see them plz contact me.
Summary: mostly white lights flashing with a few red and blueish green lights. It looked like it was twirling and more than once i seen. with bonoculars what looked like saucer shaped crafts comming from it then it went to one white light hoovering for awhile the
